benchmark_details.name: TEMMED-BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: TEMMED-BENCH is the first benchmark designed for analyzing changes in patientsâ€™ conditions between different clinical visits, challenging large vision-language models to reason over temporal medical images.
benchmark_details.data_type: visual question-answering pairs, report generation, image-pair selection

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the ability of large vision-language models in reasoning over temporal medical images and to provide a comprehensive assessment that simulates real-world clinical practices.

data.annotation: Reviews and generation using expert input and automatic methods.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated using standard evaluation methods defined for each task.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in reasoning tasks pertaining to temporal medical images.
methodology.baseline_results: Highest VQA accuracy achieved by GPT o4-mini at 79.15%.
methodology.validation: Extensive evaluation conducted on twelve large vision-language models.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Anonymization procedures were implemented; no personally identifiable information was retained.
